body_text.text: List of the complete Streptococcus pyogenes genomes used for the phylogenetic analysis Core--genome phylogeny was done using Parsnp [1] . SF370 was used as reference for the detection of mutations in covR, covS, rocA, ropB. FDAARGOS_149, MGAS8232 and STAB10015 were used as references to detect SNPs in the core--genome of the 3 groups of closely related isolates (ISR3 & ISR4, ISR7 & ISR8 and ISR9 & ISR11, respectively). spea : streptococcal exotoxin A precursor, phage--associated grab : protein G--related alpha 2M--bindingprotein speB : pyrogenic exotoxin B hasA : hyaluronate synthase spec : streptococcal exotoxin C precursor, phage--associated hasB : UDP--glucose 6--dehydrogenase speg : streptococcal exotoxin G precursor hasC : UDP--glucose pyrophosphorylase speh : streptococcal exotoxin H precursor hylP : hyaluronidase, phage--associated spei : streptococcal exotoxin I precursor ideS/mac : immunoglobulin G--degrading enzyme spej : streptococcal exotoxin J precursor lepA : signal peptidase I
spek : streptococcal exotoxin SpeK, phage--associated lmb : Laminin--binding surface protein srtC1 : sortase

BIBREF1.title: QUAST: quality assessment tool for genome assemblies

BIBREF2.title: Highly frequent mutations in negative regulators of multiple virulence genes in group A streptococcal toxic shock syndrome isolates

BIBREF3.title: A Truncation in the Regulator RocA Underlies Heightened Capsule Expression in Serotype M3 Group A Streptococci

BIBREF4.title: VFDB 2016: hierarchical and refined dataset for big data analysis-10 years on

TABREF1.text: Mutations detected in 4 different regulatory genes (covR, covS, rocA, ropB) and their effect on gene productsWT: Wild Type, nr: nucleotide replacement, del: deletion. *mutations described by Ikebe et al.[3] °mutations described by Lynskey et al.[4] Table S4 Virulence factor genes their products, extracted from the Virulence Factor Database [5] Virulence factors ccmA : ABC transporter involved in cytochrome c biogenesis, ATPase component CcmA mf/spd : Streptodornase cheA : chemotaxis histidine kinase mf2 : deoxyribonuclease, phage--associated cpa : fibronectin--binding protein, GAS pilus tip adhesin mf3 : deoxyribonuclease EF0818 : polysaccharide lyase, family 8 (Hyaluronidase) scpA : C5a peptidase precursor emm : M protein scpB : streptococcal C5a peptidase fbaA : protein F2 like fibronectin--binding protein sic : streptococcal inhibitor of complement fbaB : fibronectin--bing protein SfbII ska : streptokinase A precursor fbp54 : fibronectin--bing protein Fbp54 slo : streptolysin O precursor fctA : major pilin FctA smeZ : streptococcal mitogenic exotoxin Z fctB : minor pilin FctB
